name: SCART360
description: SCART360 was founded in 2021 by a UK-based team comprising proactive members of the UK's leading sports collectibles and memorabilia industry. It is a multichain ecosystem where sports fans worldwide can collect, trade, and mint rare sports collectibles and art pieces as digital or physical items through the SCART360 NFT marketplace and physical store, respectively. The SCART token serves as the native currency of the SCART360 ecosystem, providing multiple utilities within the platform. Additionally, all ecosystem users are rewarded with D-cash reward tokens, which can be redeemed for discounts at the SCART360 store.
